item.title: PI Working Deposit Worn Items
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Mystic-Effect, post:1, topic:434373”][center]
Credits 100% R-S Null Code (ME)[/center]

[center]This does not put items in the invi and then bank them…[/center]

case 82024: for (int i = 0; i < c.playerEquipment.length; i++) { int itemId = c.playerEquipment[i]; int itemAmount = c.playerEquipmentN[i]; c.getItems().removeItem(itemId, i); c.getItems().bankItem(itemId, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemId), itemAmount); } break; [/quote]Snippet, but thanks. Saves me time :3

Read full topic

item.title: PI Working Deposit Worn Items
item.dc:creator: @Mystic-Effect Mystic-Effect
item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

[center]
Credits 100% R-S Null Code (ME)[/center]

[center]This does not put items in the invi and then bank them…[/center]

case 82024:
        for (int i = 0; i < c.playerEquipment.length; i++) {
        int itemId = c.playerEquipment[i];
        int itemAmount = c.playerEquipmentN[i];
        c.getItems().removeItem(itemId, i);
        c.getItems().bankItem(itemId, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemId), itemAmount);
    }
				break;

Read full topic
